E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 5/23/1974
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Jim Manning



Date: Sunday, 5/25/1974
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Bill Graham



Date: Tuesday, 5/27/1974
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Rollie Fingers



Date: Thursday, 5/29/1974
Subject: Progress of Mike T. Stanton
Dear Sir,
Mike T. Stanton has nothing more to prove at A Fort Lauderdale Yankees!
He has an ERA of 3.74 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
